question: World Heritage Week is to be celebrated by UNESCO between November 19, 2019 and November 25, 2019.In this context what is the number of World Heritage Sites in India?
explanation: World Heritage Week is to be celebrated by UNESCO between November 19, 2019 and November 25, 2019. The Objective of celebrating World Heritage Week is to increase awareness among people about safety and preservation of cultural heritages and monuments.There are 38 World Heritage Sites located in India.These include 30 cultural sites, seven natural sites and one mixed site. India has the sixth largest number of sites in the world.
